message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price of $1,100,000. This is a one-time opportunity to acquire a unique item that I'm sure you'll love.
Alice, your product is great, but I'm looking to spend no more than $1,000,000. I'm happy to close the deal at that price, but if you're not willing to come down, I'll have to consider other options.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $1,050,000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I'm confident you'll find it a fair deal.

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you consider $1,025,000?  This is a fair compromise that gets us both closer to our desired price. Let me know what you think.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $1,075,000. This is the best I can do, and I'm confident it's a fair price considering the product's value.
